title: Motel Rooms
description: Clean, smoke-free motel rooms with various bed sizes. Includes free Wi-Fi, coffee maker, microwave, and flat-screen TV.

title: Private Cottages
description: Individual, charming cottages for a cozy Adirondack experience. Steps from the village and amenities.

title: House Rentals
description: Spacious 1-4 bedroom homes for families and groups. Some units feature private pools and full kitchens.
